subject: Suits and Litigation
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Harold Reynolds, a baseball analyst who was accused of sexual harassment and fired by ESPN last year, was scheduled to earn at least $4.875 million in a six-year contract that went into effect last March.
snippet: Harold Reynolds, a baseball analyst who was accused of sexual harassment and fired by ESPN last year, was scheduled to earn at least $4.875 million in a six-year contract that went into effect last March.
